CronFormat_comment: minute (0-59), hour (0-23), day of month (1-31), month of year (1-12:JAN-DEC case-insensitive), day of week (0-7:MON-SUN case-insensitive) 1 is always Monday
maxPollIntervalMsComment: Changed to 300s (5 minutes), kafka default is 30 seconds, which causes containers to stop during startup (heavy system load
purchaseTimeoutMsComment: timeout for completion when calling purchase in sync mode
allThoseFollowingAreComingFromNGLMQA: this is not yet OK, just a first try
